title: Capture the Jade - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Ancient China   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Late Romance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Nobles   Revenge   Royalty   Spirits
author: Ning Long   凝陇
description:
The overhead of the Tang Dynasty, the story of capturing the spirits.

“The stones on the other mountains are hard enough to carve and polish jade”. 

To Prince Cheng, Lin Chengyou, Teng Yuyi is the piece of “jade” that he can not capture. 

The proud son of the heavens is on the road to chase his wife to death.
>
